page.title: 08The Red Lion..Village Hall.
page.content: {The Red Lion} is a very popular pub which has a thatched roof. The building is very old and has been standing there since the 14th century. The pub has two bars and serves beer and other drinks and also has a variety of food. Their busiest day is Saturday because most people have free time then. They have a barn to store the coolers to cool the beer. There is a small shop between the bars where they sell crisps, sweet drinks and cigarettes. {Village Hall} The Brightwell Village Hall can be found on The Street. It used to be the school until the present school building was erected. Many clubs and societies meet in the village hall, including the Playschool, Bingo club, Youth club, and clubs for senior citizens. Brightwell is very active and much use is made of the Hall.
